name: Chroma (itch) (Thibault BLANCHE)
description:
Chroma is a FPS/3D platformer made with Unity.  🎲

It was a student group project made in  one month. I was in charge of the level design/building and the game design.  📐🔨 📝

In this game you have to reach the end of 3 levels by solving puzzles, you play a robot who can jump and use 3 guns with differents abilities like creating a bouncing buzzer,  freezing platforms or creating blocks. You can merge their mechanics to make your way trough the puzzles ! 🔫🎨


Even if there is no timer ingame, i'm curious about how fast you can beat those levels, feel free to type your best time in the comment section ! 💬⏱️
